trans-unit.source: dotnet-run command | .NET Core SDK
trans-unit.target: dotnet-run 命令 | .NET Core SDK

trans-unit.source: The dotnet-run command provides a convenient option to run your application from the source code.
trans-unit.target: dotnet-run 命令为从源代码运行应用程序提供了一个方便的选项。

trans-unit.source: dotnet-run, CLI, CLI command, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: dotnet-run, CLI, CLI 命令, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: dotnet-run
trans-unit.target: dotnet-run

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: 名称

trans-unit.source: dotnet-run -- Runs source code 'in-place' without any explicit compile or launch commands
trans-unit.target: dotnet-run - 无需任何显式编译或启动命令即可“就地”运行源代码

trans-unit.source: Synopsis
trans-unit.target: 摘要

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet run` command provides a convenient option to run your application from the source code with one command.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet run` 命令为从源代码使用一个命令运行应用程序提供了一个方便的选项。

trans-unit.source: It compiles source code, generates an output program and then runs that program.
trans-unit.target: 它会编译源代码、生成输出程序，然后运行该程序。

trans-unit.source: This command is useful for fast iterative development and can also be used to run a source-distributed program (for example, a website).
trans-unit.target: 此命令可用于快速迭代开发，还可用于运行源分布式程序（例如，网站）。

trans-unit.source: This command relies on [dotnet build](dotnet-build.md) to build source inputs to a .NET assembly, before launching the program.
trans-unit.target: 此命令依赖于 [dotnet 生成](dotnet-build.md)，以便在启动程序前生成 .NET 程序集的源输入。

trans-unit.source: The requirements for this command and the handling of source inputs are all inherited from the build command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的要求和源输入的处理均继承自生成命令。

trans-unit.source: The documentation for the build command provides more information on those requirements.
trans-unit.target: 生成命令文档提供了有关这些要求的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Output files are written to the child *bin* folder, which will be created if it doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 输出文件会被写入子 *bin* 文件夹，如果此文件夹不存在，则创建一个。

trans-unit.source: Files will be overwritten as needed.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要覆盖文件。

trans-unit.source: Temporary files are written to the child *obj* folder.
trans-unit.target: 临时文件会被写入子 *obj* 文件夹。

trans-unit.source: In case of a project with multiple specified frameworks, `dotnet run` will first select the .NET Core frameworks.
trans-unit.target: 对于具有多个指定框架的项目，`dotnet run` 将首先选择 .NET Core 框架。

trans-unit.source: If those do not exist, it will error out.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，则将出错。

trans-unit.source: To specify other frameworks, use the `--framework` argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定其他框架，请使用 `--framework` 参数。

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet run` command must be used in the context of projects, not built assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 必须在项目上下文，而不是生成程序集中使用 `dotnet run` 命令。

trans-unit.source: If you're trying to run a portable application DLL instead, you should use [dotnet](dotnet.md) without any command like in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试改为运行可移植应用程序 DLL，应使用 [dotnet](dotnet.md)，切勿使用如下所示的任何命令：

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `dotnet` driver, see the [.NET Core Command Line Tools (CLI)](index.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关 `dotnet` 驱动程序的详细信息，请参阅 [.NET Core 命令行工具 (CLI)](index.md) 主题。

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: 选项

trans-unit.source: Delimits arguments to `dotnet run` from arguments for the application being run.
trans-unit.target: 将参数分隔到正在运行的应用程序的参数的 `dotnet run`。

trans-unit.source: All arguments after this one will be passed to the application being run.
trans-unit.target: 在此参数后的所有参数均会被传递给正在运行的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Prints out a short help for the command.
trans-unit.target: 打印出有关命令的简短帮助。

trans-unit.source: `-f`, `--framework <FRAMEWORK_IDENTIFIER>`
trans-unit.target: `-f`, `--framework <FRAMEWORK_IDENTIFIER>`

trans-unit.source: Runs the application for a given framework identifier (FID).
trans-unit.target: 运行针对给定框架标识符 (FID) 的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: `-c`, `--configuration <Debug|Release>`
trans-unit.target: `-c`, `--configuration <Debug|Release>`

trans-unit.source: Configuration to use when publishing.
trans-unit.target: 发布时要使用的配置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Debug`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `Debug`。

trans-unit.source: `-p`, `--project [PATH]`
trans-unit.target: `-p`, `--project [PATH]`

trans-unit.source: Specifies which project to run.
trans-unit.target: 指定要运行的项目。

trans-unit.source: It can be a path to a [csproj](csproj.md) file or to a directory containing a [csproj](csproj.md) file.
trans-unit.target: 它可能是 [csproj](csproj.md) 文件的路径或包含 [csproj](csproj.md) 文件的目录路径。

trans-unit.source: It defaults to current directory if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 如未指定，则默认为当前目录。

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Run the project in the current directory: `dotnet run`
trans-unit.target: 运行当前目录中的项目：`dotnet run`

trans-unit.source: Run the specified project:
trans-unit.target: 运行指定的项目：

trans-unit.source: Run the project in the current directory (the `--help` argument in this example is passed to the application being run, since the `--` argument was used):
trans-unit.target: 运行当前目录中的项目（在本例中，`--help` 参数被传递到正在运行的应用程序，因为使用了 `--` 参数）：
